summary: A group of complete strangers find themselves isolated by a wealthy madman on his island compound.
cast: Yancy Butler|Patrick Bergin|Joshua Michael Allen|Bart Baggett|Erin Coker|Frankie Cullen|Valerie K. Garcia|Billy Ray|Meredith Thomas|Robert Matthew Wallace|Eric s Wilson|Israel Wright|Josh Williams|John Paul Bennett|D'Janine King-Lasky|Brittany Lasky
director: Director: Christopher Ray (as Christopher Douglas-Olen Ray)
title: Shark Week
